intro: Astronidium parviflorum, commonly known as the small-flowered Astronidium, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a slightly hairy texture. It is typically found in humid, shaded environments within rainforests.
